targets.rawSql: select max(batch_num) as max_batch from state.batch limit 10;
select max(batch_num) as max_verified_batch from state.verified_batch LIMIT 10;
select max(batch_num) as max_virtual_batch from state.virtual_batch LIMIT 10;
select max(block_num) as max_block from state.block limit 10;
select max(block_num) as max_l2block from state.l2block limit 10;
select max(block_num) as max_monitored_txs from state.monitored_txs limit 10;
select max(block_num) as max_receipt from state.receipt limit 10;
select max(block_num) as max_verified_batch from state.verified_batch limit 10;
select max(block_num) as max_virtual_batch from state.virtual_batch limit 10;
